sentence: "Fox News was racist before #coronavirus, they are racist during coronavirus, and Fox News will be racist after the coronavirus" @JoyAnnReid #AMJoy #MSNBC #SundayMorning pic.twitter.com/0oOQWqkSE8 Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) March 15, 2020 Stolen emails, stolen drone, stolen election .....welcome to the world of #unpresidented Trump https://t.co/NI7vqPV6cu Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) December 18, 2016 Reminder: Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams.https://t.co/ZIKGTd6U1v Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) April 2, 2020 As Guy stated, all this coming from the administration that promised to unite the country.
author: Leah Barkoukis
title: Biden's New Press Secretary Had Some Interesting Things to Say About Fox News

sentence: And we're quoting: "Reminder," she wrote, "Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams."
title: Tucker: Karine Jean-Pierre is furious at America, despite her ample privilege

sentence: And if Psaki views undermining our institutions and the public's faith in our system as part of her job, it may be a seamless transition to her successor: Reminder: Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams.https://t.co/ZIKGTd6U1v Karine Jean-Pierre (@K_JeanPierre) April 2, 2020 To be fair to Ms. Jean-Pierre, she is hardly alone in embracing this conspiracy theory for political reasons.
author: Guy Benson
title: Will Biden's Ministry of Truth Investigate His New Press Secretary?

sentence: Back on April 2nd, 2020, she tweeted "Reminder Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams."

title: Greg Gutfeld: Karine Jean-Pierre's tweets matter

title: The Hill's 12:30 Report  Elon Musk's Twitter deal hits snag

sentence: Not only is he petulant dotard but also a deplorable illegitimate president,? was her sentiment in 2017. Reminder: Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams,? she said of Abramss gubernatorial loss to Republican Brian Kemp.
